law.text:
The Department of Revenue shall print on the face of the Kentucky individual income tax form a space for a taxpayer to designate that a contribution be made to the Kentucky Nature and Wildlife Fund from that taxpayer's income tax refund. The space for designating the contribution shall be in substantially the following form: KENTUCKY NATURE AND WILDLIFE FUND. I wish to contribute $2----- $5----- $10----- $----- of my TAX REFUND TO THE KENTUCKY NATURE AND WILDLIFE FUND.
The Department of Revenue shall print in the instructions accompanying the individual income tax form a description of the purposes for which the Kentucky Nature and Wildlife Fund was established and the use of moneys from the income tax check-off.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 514, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
